text: Ignazio Cassis (born 13 April 1961) is a Swiss physician and politician. He was the President of the Swiss Confederation from 2022 to 2023. He is a member of the FDP.The Liberals and was elected to the Federal Council of Switzerland on 20 September 2017. He has served since 1 November 2017 as head of the Department of Foreign Affairs. He was born in Sessa, Switzerland. Cassis took office on 1 November 2017 as head of the Department of Foreign Affairs, succeeding Didier Burkhalter. == References == == Other websites == * * Biography of Ignazio Cassis on the website of the Swiss Parliament . * Profile of Ignazio Cassis with election results on the website of the Swiss Federal Council. |- |- |- Category:1961 births Category:Swiss physicians Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Living people Category:People from Ticino
title: Ignazio Cassis
